item.title: Jared Kushner's coronavirus overreach puts more American lives on the line | Lloyd Green
item.description: Jared Kushner is not a guy to turn to for sound political advice. Most recently, he reportedly told the president that Andrew Cuomo, New York’s governor, was being “alarmist” after he announced that his state required 30,000 ventilators to help get through the pandemic.

item.title: ¡Atención, Cali! Desde el lunes aplicará el 'Pico y cédula'
item.description: Aunque el secretario de Seguridad de Cali, Carlos Alberto Rojas, había dicho inicialmente que el ‘Pico y cédula’ empezaba este viernes, la medida arrancará el lunes 6 de abril. Con esta decisión se busca que la población haga compras por turnos en supermercados, y establecimientos comerciales y bancarios, con el llamado reiterado a los vallecaucanos para que guarden el aislamiento de rigor por el coronavirus.

item.title: Coronavirus en Ecuador: el drama de Guayaquil, que tiene más muertos por covid-19 que países enteros y lucha a contrarreloj para darles un entierro digno
item.description: Derechos de autor de la imagen Reuters Image caption Ecuador es uno de los países de la región con mas casos confirmados y muertes por covid-19. A las miles de imágenes de ciudades vacías y hospitales colapsados impresas alrededor del mundo por la pandemia de coronavirus, en la ciudad ecuatoriana de Guayaquil se sumaron en la última semana videos y testimonios sobre personas muriendo en las calles y cuerpos esperando días para ser recogidos en los hogares.

item.title: Dette er årets påskekrim på TV
item.description: Det blir en annerledes påske i år, men du kan fortsatt regne med påskekrimmen. Her får du komplett oversikt over hva som sendes på NRK og TV 2. Til tross for koronakrisen svikter ikke NRK og TV 2 krimhungeren som tradisjonen tro oppstår for oss nordmenn i påskeferien.

item.title: ¡Conmueve! Mariano Iúdica no está pasando un buen momento y lo demuestra con un estremecedor mensaje
item.description: Mariano Iúdica es uno de los mediáticos más sensibles del medio, suele demostrar sus sentimientos de manera frecuente en la pantalla o en las redes. Y como no podía ser la excepción esta vez posteo un mensaje conmovedor en su Instagram.

item.title: حقيقة إعفاء مدير الشؤون الصحية بالمدينة المنورة
item.description: وكانت المدينة المنورة سجلت يوم أمس 48 حالة إصابة بفيروس كورونا الجديد وفق ما أعلنه المتحدث باسم وزارة الصحة فيما سجلت مكة المكرمة 46 حالة. ومما يذكر أنه تم منع التجول في كل من المدينة المنورة ومكة المكرمة على مدى 24 ساعة وتم السماح في أضيق الحدود لأهالي المدينة بالتنقل داخل الأحياء السكنية من السادسة صباحًا حتى الثالثة عصرًا لقضاء الحاجات الأساسية مثل شراء المستلزمات الغذائية أو زيارة المراكز الصحية.

item.title: Collibra nabs another $112.5M at a $2.3B valuation for its big data management platform – TechCrunch
item.description: GDPR and other data protection and privacy regulations — as well as a significant (and growing) number of data breaches and exposées of companies’ privacy policies — have put a spotlight on not just the vast troves of data that businesses and other organizations hold on us, but also how they handle it.

item.title: SMHI: Göteborgs varmaste vinter på 148 år
item.description: SMHI:s mätstation i Göteborg har i år uppmätt den varmaste vintern sedan 1872, uppger P4 Göteborg. Under december, januari och februari har genomsnittstemperaturen legat på fem grader över normalt. – Det är ju så det kommer se ut i framtiden med varmare vintrar som den här och förstås med mindre snö och mera regn, säger Hans Linderholm, professor i naturgeografi vid Göteborgs universitet, till P4 Göteborg.

item.title: Heidi Klum Says Daughter Leni Wants to Follow in Her Footsteps but Is 'Her Own Little Person'
item.description: Heidi Klum might soon be passing the style torch on to her daughter! The Making the Cut star, 46, opens up about the show, family life and more in this week’s issue of PEOPLE alongside co-creator and co-host Tim Gunn, revealing that while her 15-year-old daughter Leni is “her own little person,” she does have a certain knack for her mom’s career path.

item.title: В мэрии Москвы объяснили, на кого будут распространяться штрафы за нарушение самоизоляции
item.description: Штрафы за нарушение режима самоизоляции в Москве будут распространяться на тех, кто собирается большими группами. Об этом РИА Новости сообщили в пресс-службе столичной мэрии. «Если люди не будут собираться большими группами, будут соблюдать режим самоизоляции и выходить на улицу лишь в экстренных случаях, то в настоящее время я не вижу предпосылок к получению штрафа»,

item.title: Se estrenó la cuarta temporada de “La Casa de Papel”: las claves para entender la nueva historia

Ese viaje en el tiempo nos permite a los espectadores entender cómo todas las situaciones inusuales que puedan surgir están resguardadas dentro del plan que El Profesor, Berlín (Pedro Alonso) y Palermo idearon en un tiempo no tan lejano.

item.title: Free childcare is too good to be true. But could this start a revolution? | Eva Cox
item.description: Free childcare was one of the goals of second wave feminism, when we took up the cause of gender equity in the 70s. It seemed logical, because children need access to other children and expert care to develop the skills that parents can’t provide, and allowed particularly mothers, as the primary carer, time for paid work and other activities.

item.title: Карантин в Париже: свежий воздух и изобилие продуктов
item.description: С масками во Франции произошла очень плохая история. Как выяснилось уже в разгар нынешней эпидемии, в 2009 г. во время свиного гриппа A/H1N1 (который Францию особо не затронул) был создан стратегический запас – 1,6 млрд масок (хирургических и респираторов стандарта FFP2).

item.title: COVID-19: Around 60,000 applications received for Temporary Relief Fund – Desmond Lee
item.description: SINGAPORE — Around 60,000 people in Singapore have applied for the Temporary Relief Fund (TRF), which provides urgent financial assistance for those affected by the COVID-19 pandemic, since it was launched on Wednesday (1 April).

item.description: Praha - Klinika infekčních nemocí pražské Ústřední vojenské nemocnice (ÚVN) dosud přijala 34 pacientů s onemocněním COVID-19, patnácti nakaženým lékaři podali látku hydroxychlorochin. Osm z nich už propustili do domácího ošetřování.

item.title: ‘The Witches’ Star Vincent Marzello Dies at 68
item.description: Actor Vincent Marzello, best known for his roles in “The Witches,” “Superman” and “The Spy Who Loved Me,” died on Tuesday. He was 68. Marzello’s wife, “Notting Hill” actor Lorelei King, tweeted the news.

item.title: Ανάσταση: Τι είναι η Απόδοση του Πάσχα
item.description: ΠΑΣΧΑ 26 ΜΑΙΟΥ: Η είδηση για την μετάθεση της Αναστάσιμης Παννυχίδας στην Απόδοση του Πάσχα στα τέλη Μαΐου, έπιασε πολλούς αδιάβαστους . Η είδηση από την χθεσινή έκτακτη συνεδρίαση της Ιεράς Συνόδου δεν ήταν ούτε η ανακοίνωση πως οι λειτουργίες την Μεγάλη Εβδομάδα θα γίνουν κεκλεισμένων των θυρών, ούτε η φράση σχετικά με την Θεία Ευχαριστία και κοινωνία.

H καταξιωμένη ηθοποιός Κάτια Δανδουλάκη, συμμετέχει κι εκείνη, μαζί με ένα σύνολο αγαπημένων ηθοποιών στην επικοινωνιακή εκστρατεία της δημόσιας ραδιοτηλεόρασης με σύνθημα «Μένουμε σπίτι για όσους αγαπάμε».

item.title: Bunnings offers gym equipment online as Aussies forced to exercise indoors

item.title: German adventurer and activist Rüdiger Nehberg dies

item.title: Why the Global Recession Could Last a Long Time
item.description: LONDON — The world is almost certainly ensnared in a devastating recession delivered by the coronavirus pandemic. Now, fears are growing that the downturn could be far more punishing and long lasting than initially feared — potentially enduring into next year, and even beyond — as governments intensify restrictions on business to halt the spread of the pandemic, and as fear of the virus reconfigures the very concept of public space, impeding consumer-led economic growth.

item.title: Immobilier: les taux hypothécaires montent
item.description: Le coronavirus entraîne une forte nervosité sur les marchés financiers et cela se reflète sur les taux hypothécaires. Celui sur dix ans a significativement grimpé en peu de temps. «La hausse des coûts de refinancement entraîne actuellement une augmentation des taux hypothécaires», a assuré Frédéric Papp, expert financier chez Comparis, cité dans le communiqué publié mercredi.

item.title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Riverdale star KJ Apa's parents contract Covid-19 after trip to LA to see his film premiere
item.description: Riverdale star KJ Apa’s parents contracted Covid-19 after a trip to Los Angeles, where they attended their son’s movie premiere. ““Honestly I thought I was going to die … people absolutely need to take this seriously - it’s the worst thing I’ve ever had,” Tupa’i Keneti Apa told the Coconet.

item.title: NTUC FairPrice closes Bedok Mall supermarket for 3 days for cleaning after employee diagnosed with Covid-19
item.description: SINGAPORE - NTUC FairPrice has closed its FairPrice Finest supermarket in Bedok Mall after one of its staff tested positive for Covid-19 on Tuesday (March 31). In a statement on Wednesday, FairPrice said the store will be closed for three days for deep cleaning and will reopen on April 4.

item.title: Inland Revenue: 240,000 letters cancelling Working for Families payments mistakenly sent
item.description: About 240,000 people were mistakenly sent a letter from Inland Revenue informing them their Working for Families payments had been cancelled. The Notice of Entitlement letter told recipients they would not receive any payments from April 1.

La presentadora, quien siempre se ha caracterizado por llevar consigo atuendos vistosos y que además llamen la atención de sus seguidores en la televisión y redes, en la presentación de la noche anterior, Paulina fue vestida de una manera muy particular.

item.title: Föräldrar arga efter lärarens aprilskämt
item.description: Läraren på Bergaskolan i Limhamn fick sin idé på onsdagsförmiddagen. Han satte sig vid datorn och skrev ett fejkat brev från skolledningen, att dela ut till eleverna. Som en löpeld spred sig hotet att eleverna på Bergaskolan skulle bli tvungna att gå i skolan under påsken.

item.description: Riverdale star KJ Apa’s parents contracted Covid-19 after attending a movie premiere in Los Angeles with the star, they have revealed. In a diary detailing his experience for the The Coconet, Tupa’i Keneti Apa said he thought he was “going to die” after contracting the virus.

item.title: Pro OSVČ 25 000 Kč jednorázově. Jaké podmínky musíte splnit?
item.description: Vláda 31. března 2020 rozhodla o finanční podpoře pro osoby samostatně výdělečně činné (OSVČ). Lidé, kteří mají podnikání jako hlavní činnost obživy a negativně je zasáhla omezení vlády související s vyhlášením nouzového stavu a karanténou, a vejdou se do podmínek popsaných níže, dostanou jako kompenzaci jednorázově 25 000 Kč.

item.title: Maanzoni Lodge closed indefinitely

item.title: Coronavirus forces crackdown on April Fools' Day capers
item.description: ![img](http://s.rfi.fr/media/display/485609da-73eb-11ea-a5a2-005056bf87d6/w:1240/p:16x9/Joker Card.jpg) Cancelling the tradition of tall tales has the aroma of an April Fools’ jest. But tech giant Google has told staff to steer clear of the day’s usual tomfoolery as the world suffers the effects of the coronavirus.

item.title: Gov. Andrew Cuomo gives emotional update on brother Chris Cuomo's coronavirus: 'I'm worried'
item.description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo gave an emotional update during his Wednesday coronavirus briefing about his younger brother, CNN’s Chris Cuomo, who announced his COVID-19 diagnosis a day prior. Reiterating that the news personality is isolated at home and “doing fine,” the governor used his brother has an example of how “anyone” can get coronavirus.

item.title: Google Doodle Spotlights Jean Macnamara, a Doctor Who Fought Sexism to Help Cure Polio
item.description: All around the world, scientists and medical professionals are currently scrambling not just to contain and minimize the spread of the coronavirus, but to find ways to cure it. In such a terrifying situation, it feels fitting that Wednesday’s Google Doodle honors the birthday of Dame Jean Macnamara, an Australian doctor and medical innovator who, in the first half of the 20th century, became an instrumental figure in the battle against polio.

item.title: Karel Gott (†80) dal přednost Ivaně: Mistrova ex má podezření na koronavirus!

item.title: هُنا موقع وزارة القوى العاملة تسجيل العمالة الغير منتظمة 2020 وأخبار منحة الـ 500 جنيهاً “manpower.qov.eq”
item.description: تعمل وزارة القوى العاملة علي تسجيل العمالة الغير منتظمة 2020 في كافة أنحاء الجمهورية، حيث بدأ السادة المحافظين يهيبون المواطنين الذين يستحقون الدعم والمنحة المقدمة أن يقوموا بالتسجيل عبر موقع الوزارة، لذلك نرفق لكم الآن كيفية التسجيل والدخول إلي الموقع الإلكتروني لتسجيل الأسماء والتعرف علي كافة المشاكل وحلولها بالشرح المفصل.

item.title: Betty Kyallo’s message to fans who defended her after online bitter rant
item.description: Media personality Betty Kyallo has come out to thank the people who stood with her and defended her after an online bitter rant where she condemned haters dictating how she should live her life.

item.title: Hollyoaks babe Jorgie Porter worries she's 'too old' for scantily-clad calendar shoots
item.description: Hollyoaks beauty Jorgie Porter fears she’s “too told” to continue with her racy calendar shoots any longer. The soap star, 32, who played Theresa McQueen in the Channel 4 show, has previously won many awards for her sexy looks and featured in several lads’ mags over the years.

item.title: Lee Min Ho And Jung Eun Chae Have A Quiet, But Tense Exchange In “The King: Eternal Monarch”
item.description: Upcoming SBS drama “The King: Eternal Monarch” has released new stills of Lee Min Ho and Jung Eun Chae. The drama, starring Lee Min Ho and Kim Go Eun, tells the story of two parallel worlds, one in which Korea is a constitutional monarchy ruled by emperor Lee Gon (Lee Min Ho), and one similar to present-day Korea, where Jung Tae Eul (played by Kim Go Eun) is a detective.

item.title: Aprobado por unanimidad: Congreso despacha veto presidencial que corrige ley de permisos de circulación
item.description: Tanto la Cámara de Diputados como el Senado aprobaron por unanimidad el veto presidencial anunciado por Sebastián Piñera a la ley que establece una prórroga en el pago del permiso de circulación.

item.title: صديقه لـCNN: عبد الحليم خدام يفارق الحياة في باريس إثر أزمة قلبية
item.description: شارك في التغطية: إياد كوردي دبي، الإمارات العربية المتحدة (CNN) – أكد مصدر مقرب من نائب الرئيس السوري الأسبق، عبد الحليم خدام، نبأ وفاته بسبب تقدمه في العمر وإثر أزمة قلبية، مشيرا إلى أن موعد ومكان الدفن لا يزالا غير محددين نظرا لظروف انتشار فيروس كورونا المستجد في فرنسا التي تُوفي فيها السياسي السوري البارز.

item.title: Zoom faces a privacy and security backlash as it surges in popularity
item.description: Zoom has exploded in popularity as people turn to video calling software amid the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. The moment of huge growth has seen Zoom rocket to the top of iOS and Android app stores as people gather around it for yoga classes, school lessons, and virtual nights out.

item.title: Día de los inocentes y de las bromas en Estados Unidos: por qué se celebra el 1 de abril
item.description: Es el April Fool’s Day o el “Día de los Tontos de abril”, según su traducción literal. Cada año, los estadounidenses planifican con entusiasmo y creatividad las bromas que harán ese día, el 1 de abril, cuando hasta los periódicos sorprenderán a sus lectores con noticias que, aunque inofensivas, resultarán ser falsas.

item.title: Лев Лещенко поблагодарил участников флешмоба 'Надежда' за поддержку
item.description: Ранее главврач Коммунарской больницы, куда поступил Лещенко, сообщил, что артист заболел пневмонией на фоне коронавируса . Певец попал в реанимацию, но несколько дней назад его перевели в обычную палату. Директор культурного фонда Лещенко Андрей Гайдель попросил артистов и поклонников певца поддержать его с супругой во время болезни и записать песню “Надежда” на видео.

item.title: Toate lămuririle despre declarația pe proprie răspundere. Ce verifică, de fapt, polițiștii. Ce se întâmplă dacă ești nesincer
item.description: De Adriana Oprea, Poliţia Română răspunde la întrebările ziarului Libertatea, primite de la cititori, şi ne spune ce trebuie să facem, pentru a respecta legea. Întrebare 1: Ordonanţa Militară nr. 3/2020 prevede la art 4, alin (1), că „pentru verificarea motivului deplasării, angajații prezintă legitimația de serviciu sau adeverința eliberată de angajator”.

item.title: 3M Faces Pressure to Prevent N95 Mask Distributors’ Price Gouging
item.description: As the black market trade of its N95 respirator masks has continued to swell, pressure is mounting on 3M, which manufactures the masks and other protective gear, to crack down on price gouging among its distributors.

item.description: Agent dismisses report that Yussuf Poulsen wants to leave RB Leipzig By Rune Gjerulff Yussuf Poulsen’s agent has shot down rumors claiming that the 25-year-old wants to depart RB Leipzig.

item.title: Il pianista Ludovico Einaudi suona per rendere omaggio a chi sta combattendo contro il coronavirus e per il pianeta
item.description: Anche se stiamo affrontando una nuova emergenza, non dimentichiamo la condizione critica del clima che stiamo vivendo quotidianamente da molti anni ormai. Questo è un video per tutti voi che state a casa per combattere l’emergenza sanitaria e per tutti voi che avete sempre combattuto per la crisi climatica.

item.title: שנתיים אחרי שנמלט: נעצר מפיץ תמונות העירום של שרון פרי
item.description: כמעט שנתיים אחרי שמפיץ תמונות העירום של המגישה שרון פרי נמלט ולא הגיע לדיון בעניינו בבית משפט השלום בבאר שבע, הוא נעצר הלילה . האיש, תושב תל שבע בגיל 29, נמלט במאי 2018 לאחר שהורשע בפרשה וכעת - כמעט שנתיים אחר כך - יובא היום לבית משפט השלום בעיר.

item.title: BSH recipients need not register for BPN
item.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The Cost of Living Aid (BSH) recipients do not need to register for the Bantuan Prihatin Nasional (BPN). The Inland Revenue Board (IRB) in a statement today said BSH recipients were automatically eligible for BPN.

item.title: World champion boxer Billy Joe Saunders suspended following domestic violence 'advice' video
item.description: (CNN) British boxer Billy Joe Saunders has had his license suspended following a social media video in which he seemingly advocated domestic violence. In the video, the world super-middleweight champion appeared to demonstrate how men could hit their partners if “your old woman is giving you mouth” during the coronavirus lockdown.

item.title: 39 questions 'Westworld' season 3 hasn't answered yet
item.description: HBO’s “Westworld” is notoriously complicated and constantly introducing new puzzling storylines. We’ve rounded up all the lingering questions still bouncing around in our heads now that season three is underway.

item.description: Expand Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban, center, his deputy Zsolt Semjen and other government members and MPs of the governing Fidesz party vote on a draft law concerning extraordinary measures during the plenary session of Parliament in Budapest, Hungary, March 30, 2020.

item.title: 'The floor was moving': 6.5 earthquake strikes in Idaho, largest in the state since 1983
item.description: McCALL, Idaho — It was a typical Tuesday evening at the Albertsons grocery store in this resort town about 100 miles north of Boise. Until Susie Baker looked up and saw all the hanging aisle signs swinging back and forth.

item.title: AFL coronavirus: Collingwood president Eddie McGuire's fiery plea to members amid COVID-19 crisis
item.description: Collingwood Magpies president Eddie McGuire has given an impassioned plea to members of his club to stand by them during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. With the AFL season suspended temporarily, many members are seeking refunds for their club memberships.

item.title: Ειρήνη Παπαδοπούλου: Βάζει τον Πασχαλάκη σε… πρόγραμμα!
item.description: Τη καλύτερή της φάση περνά η Ειρήνη Παπαδοπούλου, που έχει βρει την προσωπική ευτυχία στα μάτια του γοητευτικού τερματοφύλακα του ΠΑΟΚ, Αλέξανδρου Πασχαλάκη. Του «έβγαλε» το λάδι Οι προπονήσεις στον ΠΑΟΚ, όπως και σε όλες της ομάδες στην Ελλάδα, έχουν διακοπεί και οι ποδοσφαιριστές μένουν σπίτι και παράλληλα ακολουθούν πρόγραμμα εκγύμνασης είτε εντός, είτε εκτός των σπιτιών τους.

item.title: Lauren London mourns Nipsey Hussle on one-year anniversary of his death
item.description: Lauren London posted a heart-wrenching tribute to late partner Nipsey Hussle on the first anniversary of his death. Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, which marked exactly a year since the rapper was murdered in south Los Angeles, Lauren, 35, shared a photo of the couple together with some poignant words.

item.title: 'Realistisch gesehen' kein regulärer Schulbetrieb im April
item.description: Die Lehrer sollen dementsprechend den Schülern Arbeitspakete bis Ende April zusammenstellen und übermitteln. Die Entscheidung, ob darin neuer Stoff oder nur Beispiele zur Vertiefung enthalten sind, soll schulautonom getroffen werden, so Faßmann.

item.title: If you think an April Fool's joke would be funny today, you are wrong
item.description: This is not the time. Every year come April Fool’s Day, some brand and/or practical joker with limited imagination thinks it’ll be fun to pull an April Fool’s joke. First off: April Fool’s jokes aren’t jokes.

item.title: Cuánto voy a cobrar por el Ingreso Familiar de Emergencia de la ANSES
item.description: El Gobierno argentino lanzó el Ingreso Familiar de Emergencia, un bono que dará la ANSES a un determinado grupo de persnas como ayuda económica para hacerle frente a la crisis económica profundizada por la pandemia de coronavirus.

item.title: Amedeo Minghi dall'ospedale: 'Sono qui ma il coronavirus non c'entra'
item.description: “Questa mascherina è per il coronavirus, bisogna sempre stare attenti. Sapervi accanto per me è importante…". In ospedale per “una serie di problemini accumulati, che alla mia età è abbastanza normale”, Amedeo Minghi mette in allarme i suoi fan con due dirette video su Facebook in cui però smentisce di essere affetto dal virus.

item.title: ‘Let me be proof’: Chris Cuomo, a little paler, broadcasts from his basement after testing positive for covid-19
item.description: “I tested positive,” he said, with white drywalls, comfy beige armchairs and a forbidden staircase in the backdrop. “Scary, yes, as you might imagine. But better me than you.” Throughout Tuesday’s episode of “Cuomo Prime Time,” the host shared his fears about the uncertainty that lies ahead for both him and the country, melding his own experience into the larger story consuming Americans.

item.title: Dia das Mentiras cancelado: 'Nenhuma brincadeira se adequa ao momento'
item.description: A Polícia de Segurança Pública (PSP) ‘cancelou’ o Dia das Mentiras, que se festeja a dia 1 de abril, exatamente esta quarta-feira. Isto porque, neste dia, em 2020, “nenhuma brincadeira se adequa ao momento que estamos a viver”.

item.title: Coronavirus status update
item.description: Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak many of the national floorball leagues have been effected and also the upcoming IFF Events and multi-sport events are continuously being evaluated. Since the last update on March 20th, new decisions have been made in Austria, Belgium, France, Latvia, Netherlands, Poland, Singapore, Slovakia, Spain and Slovenia.

item.title: ¿Por qué es feriado este 31 de marzo?
item.description: Tras 11 de días a aislamiento total, la falta de una rutina hace que muchas veces nos encontremos desorientados sobre en qué día de la semana nos encontramos. Y si a eso le sumanos el adelantamiento del feriado del 2 de abril, la confusión es mayor porque muchos desconocen el motivo real de esa decisión.

item.title: אושר דוידיאן, מתמודד 'הכוכב הבא לאירוויזיון', נהרג בתאונת דרכים
item.description: אושר דוידיאן, מתמודד העונה הקודמת של התכנית “הכוכב הבא לאירוויזיון”, נהרג אתמול (ראשון) בתאונת דרכים בדרום הארץ. דוידיאן, שהתמודד עם מחלת האוסטאוגנזיס אימפרפקטה (רככת עצמות), היה בן 25 במותו. מאז ההשתתפות בתכנית, דוידיאן התמקד בין היתר בעסק שבבעלותו, גלידריה בעיר נתיבות.

item.title: Surging bison population in Yellowstone are eating all the parks shrubs and grass
item.description: A surging bison population in Yellowstone National Park is doing serious and steady damage to the park’s biological diversity. A team of researchers from Oregon State University, Corvallis studied the animal’s effects on the park’s landscape, focusing primarily on the Lamar Valley, an area on the park’s eastern edge.

item.title: Polisi: Aurelia Margaretha dan Korban Tabrakan di Karawaci Bertetangga
item.description: Aurelia Margaretha Yulia (26) ditetapkan sebagai tersangka dalam kasus kecelakaan yang menewaskan Andre Njotohusodo (51) di Lippo Karawaci, Kota Tangerang. Aurelia dan Andre diketahui masih bertetangga. “Tersangka masih tinggal di lingkungan Perumahan Lippo Karawaci juga,” kata Kasat Lantas Metro Tangerang Kota AKBP Agung Pitoyo saat dihubungi detikcom, Rabu (1/4/2020).

item.title: Dame Jean Macnamara: Google honours work of pioneering polio scientist and doctor

Born in Australia on 1 April 1899, Macnamara realised while growing up during World War I that she wanted “to be of some use in the world”.

item.title: Coronavirus și 1 aprilie: Ani grei de închisoare pentru glume!
item.description: Departamentul de Relaţii Publice al Guvernului de la Bangkok a publicat marţi pe contul său de Twitter un infografic în care se afirmă că „este împotriva legii ca oamenii să pretindă în mod fals că au COVID-19 cu ocazia Zilei Păcălelilor, sărbătorită pe 1 Aprili”.

item.title: Pape Diouf, who led Marseille to Ligue 1 title, dies from coronavirus
item.description: Former Marseille president Pape Diouf has died aged 68 after contracting the new coronavirus, a family source told AFP on Tuesday. Diouf, who was born in Chad but had French and Senegalese citizenship, led the club between 2005-2009 and helped build the side who lifted the Ligue 1 title in 2010.

item.title: Tougher New Zealand rules on Covid-19 could set it apart as 'normal' nation after lockdown
item.description: Epidemiologist tells parliamentary committee even more stringent measures could ‘eliminate virus over next few weeks’ Tougher New Zealand rules on Covid-19 could set it apart as ‘normal’ nation after lockdown

item.title: Κορωνοϊός: Ανησυχία για τη χλωροκίνη
item.description: Ερευνητές του Πανεπιστημίου της Μινεσότα ξεκινούν δοκιμές για τη χορήγηση του σκευάσματος κατά της ελονοσίας σε νοσούντες από κορωνοϊό. Εγκριση εκτάκτου ανάγκης έδωσε ο Οργανισμός Τροφίμων και Φαρμάκων των ΗΠΑ (FDA) στη χορήγηση δύο παλαιών φαρμάκων κατά της ελονοσίας, της χλωροκίνης και της υδροξυχλωροκίνης, σε εφήβους και ενήλικους ασθενείς με COVID-19.

item.title: A kötelező BCG-oltás segíthet a koronavírus ellen
item.description: Korábbi tudományos bizonyítékok arra utalnak, hogy a BCG-oltásnak jóval szélesebb a védőképessége, és az immunrendszert általánosan felvértezi a legkülönfélébb kórokozók ellen. Ebből kiindulva több államban klinikai teszteket kezdtek a vakcinával, hogy kiderüljön, tényleg jó-e valamennyire az új koronavírus ellen.

item.title: VIDEO. Filmul lui Bromania, Miami Bici, pe Netflix. Deocamdată doar pentru români
item.description: VIDEO. Miami Bici, filmul cu Bromania (Matei Dima) și Codin Maticiuc intră pe platforma Netflix. Producția este disponibilă abonaților chiar începând de astăzi, 1 aprilie, pe Netflix. Momentan, Miami Bici va fi disponibil doar pentru publicul din România, însă de la 1 iunie se va vedea în toată lumea, anunță reprezentanții producției.

item.title: Retired Nairobi Archbishop Ndingi Mwana’a Nzeki, 88, dies
item.description: NAIROBI, Kenya — Kenyan Catholics are mourning the death of Archbishop Raphael Ndingi Mwana’a Nzeki, 88, the retired Nairobi archbishop who died March 30 after a long illness. Cardinal John Njue announced his predecessor’s death and asked for prayers for the late archbishop, who invested heavily in education.

item.title: Nizamuddin Markaj Update: सरकार की बड़ी कार्रवाई, आयोजकों पर FIR; मरकज में शामिल विदेशियों का वीजा रद
item.description: Nizamuddin Markaj Update: सरकार की बड़ी कार्रवाई, आयोजकों पर FIR; मरकज में शामिल विदेशियों का वीजा रद जेएनएन, नई दिल्ली। देश में कोरोना से जंग में बड़े संकट के रूप में उभरे तब्लीगी जमात के खिलाफ सरकार ने सख्त कदम उठाए हैं। जमात में शामिल विदेशी सदस्यों को तलाश कर उन्हें तुरंत वापस भेजने का आदेश दिया गया है। साथ ही उसके किसी भी सदस्य को टूरिस्ट वीजा नहीं जारी करने का फैसला किया गया है। यह निर्णय दिल्ली के निजामुद्दीन में तब्लीगी जमात के कार्यक्रम में शामिल लोगों के बड़ी संख्या में कोरोना वायरस से संक्रमित पाए जाने और छह लोगों की मौत के बाद किया गया है। जमात में शामिल होने एक जनवरी से अब तक 2100 विदेशी सदस्य भारत आए और देश के विभिन्न हिस्सों में तब्लीगी गतिविधियों को अंजाम दिया।

item.title: Myron Rolle, former Titans DB, details fight against COVID-19 as a neurosurgery resident
item.description: Former Florida State and Tennessee Titans defensive back Myron Rolle went from delivering pain on the football field to healing it in the medical field. item.title: Rihanna makes history as first 'British Vogue' cover star wearing a durag
item.description: Now that Rihanna is an honourary Londoner, she should probably grace the cover of British Vogue every month (in my opinion, at least). item.title: Air Liquide, Groupe PSA, Schneider Electric, Valeo Rise to the Challenge of Producing 10,000 Air Liquide Medical Systems Respirators in Response to the French Government Request
item.description: Regulatory News: Faced with the compelling need for more respirators on its national territory, the French government has asked, on March 22, a group of French industrial companies led by Air Liquide (Paris:AI) to study the possibility of increasing the production of respirators so as to provide 10,000 respirators in 50 days, between the beginning of April and mid-May.

Неадекватное поведение артиста, которое он демонстрировал в социальных сетях, слухи о его изменах и видео, якобы их подтверждающие, странные игры с собственными детьми и не менее странные высказывания наводили на мысли о том, что семью ждет развод.

item.title: FNB fourth bank to offer payment holiday amid Covid-19 outbreak
item.description: FNB is the fourth bank to announce its relief interventions for individuals and businesses that are financially impacted by Covid-19. On Monday morning CEO Jacques Celliers announced that FNB will join Standard Bank, Nedbank and Absa from April 1 to June 30 in assisting customers who demonstrate sound banking behaviour, such as having honoured their repayments to the bank on a consistent basis prior to the epidemic.

item.title: В Петербурге ввели режим самоизоляции из-за коронавируса
item.description: МОСКВА, 30 мар — РИА Новости. Власти Власти Санкт-Петербурга ввели режим самоизоляции для всех жителей города, сообщается в постановлении регионального правительства. “Не покидать места проживания (пребывания), за исключением случаев обращения за экстренной медицинской помощью и случаев иной прямой угрозы жизни и здоровью, случаев следования к месту (от места) осуществления деятельности (в том числе работы), которая не приостановлена в соответствии с постановлением”, — говорится в документе.

item.description: (CNN) A man was arrested Sunday after leading troopers on a high-speed chase with his dog sitting in the driver’s seat, a spokeswoman for the Washington State Patrol said. The man from Lakewood, Washington, hit two cars on separate occasions and failed to stop both times, leading state troopers on a high-speed chase up Interstate 5, the spokeswoman said.

item.title: Hair Loss from Scalp Psoriasis: What to Know + How to Reduce It
item.description: One byproduct of scalp psoriasis that may affect self-esteem is hair loss. Thinning or breakage of hair does not seem to be caused by scalp psoriasis itself, but due to excess rubbing and itching of the scalp, which breaks or damages the hair follicles.

item.title: Prince Harry and Meghan Throttle Down the Royal P.R. Machine
item.description: LONDON — A day before they cease being working members of the British royal family, Prince Harry and his wife Meghan on Monday wound down their popular social media sites and transferred the management of their image and philanthropy to a new team of advisers in Los Angeles, where they recently moved.

item.description: Toni Rovira tiene las pruebas sobre la predicción de Nube de María sobre el coronavirus, una posible verdad. El fin de semana la vidente española Nube de María se hizo viral al dar sus explicaciones acerca de la pandemia para el 2020, sin embargo, se dedujo que era mentira debido que el video con fecha de 24 de diciembre de 2019 no aparecía en Youtube, Facebook u Instagram.

item.title: Mundschutz-Pflicht gegen Corona in Österreich – und in Deutschland?
item.description: Wer sollte sich eine Schutzmaske kaufen? Die Diskussion reißt nicht ab: Mundschutz ja oder Mundschutz nein? Abgesehen davon, dass sie schwer zu bekommen sind … Schutzmasken tragen: ja Ärztepräsident Klaus Reinhardt hat an die Bevölkerung appelliert, Schutzmasken zu tragen: „Mein Rat: Besorgen Sie sich einfache Schutzmasken oder basteln Sie sich selbst welche und tragen Sie diese im öffentlichen Raum“, sagte der Präsident der Bundesärztekammer (BAEK) der „Neuen Osnabrücker Zeitung“ (NOZ).

item.title: Coronavirus obliga a Honduras a extender toque de queda

item.title: Daniel Andrews Confirms Victoria Is Moving To “Stage Three” Lockdown At Midnight Tonight

item.title: Europe's clocks go forward this weekend: Here's what you need to know
item.description: London (CNN) The clocks across Europe go forward on Sunday, March 29 as the continent moves to daylight saving time. Under the current system, the clocks are put forward one hour on the last Sunday of March and back again on the last Sunday in October.

item.title: Trabalhadores se isolam em fábrica para continuar produzindo 50 mil máscaras por dia
item.description: Direito de imagem Consomed/AFP Image caption Os trabalhadores optaram por se isolar para garantir a produção de equipamentos de proteção Os funcionários de uma fábrica da Tunísia estão produzindo 50 mil máscaras por dia e outros equipamentos médicos de proteção, depois de optarem por ficar isolados no local trabalho, para auxiliar no combate à pandemia do novo coronavírus.

item.title: Elephant review – Meghan Markle adds schmaltz to Disney yarn
item.description: Last autumn, before she and her husband made it into their current Californian lockdown, Meghan Markle recorded the narration for this lavish new documentary from the Disneynature production unit, streaming on Disney+, her fee being a donation to the Elephants Without Borders conservation charity working in Botswana.

item.title: Singer-songwriter John Prine critically ill with Covid-19
item.description: (CNN) Musician John Prine is in a critical condition in hospital after a “sudden onset” of coronavirus symptoms, his family says. Prine, 73, was hospitalized on Thursday and intubated Saturday night and continues to receive care but “his situation is critical,” according to a family statement posted on his verified Twitter account.

item.title: Drop in China's new coronavirus cases; none in Wuhan for sixth day
item.description: WUHAN- China reported a drop in new coronavirus infections for a fourth day as drastic curbs on international travellers reined in the number of imported cases, while policymakers turned their efforts to healing the world’s second-largest economy.

item.title: Segurança Social vai pagar lay-off às empresas no dia 28 de cada mês
item.description: É uma das medidas mais importantes para a manutenção dos postos de trabalho nas empresas em Portugal. O regime de lay-off, que este sábado foi retificado pela quarta-vez, passa a proteger os despedimentos de todos os trabalhadores da empresa que recorra a este regime – e não apenas os funcionários abrangidos pela redução de horário ou interrupção da atividade –, noticiou o Expresso este sábado.

item.title: Belarus Does Not Give Up on Football
item.description: Football leagues around the world have canceled soccer games for the foreseeable future as one of the measures to slow a rapid COVID-19 spread. item.title: أحصل علي كود الطالب edmodo طريقة عمل بحث عبر منصة ادمودو التعليمية 2020 www.edmodo.com لجميع الطلاب
item.description: منصة ادمودو التعليمية 2020، يبحث عدد كبير من الطلاب المصريين علي رابط الدخول علي منصة ادمودو التعليمية الجديدة 2020، وذلك من أجل عمل البحث العلمي ومتابعة الدروس والحصص الألكترونية، بعد قرار تعليق الدراسة في مصر لمدة شهر متواصل، تخوفا من أنتشار فيروس كورونا المستجد، الذي أصبح يهدد العالم باكامل، مما جعل الوزارة تبحث في عمل منصة الكترونية جديدة، يستطيع الطلاب من خلالها استكمال الفصل الدراسي الثاني أون لاين من داخل المنازل، خصوصا وأن جميع المنازل لا يخلو منها الانترنت في ذلك الوقت، سواء علي الهاتف المحمول أو علي الكمبيوتر.

item.title: Delegacia Interativa do AM passa a registrar boletim de ocorrência de qualquer natureza criminal online
item.description: “Vamos fazer a análise da ocorrência e, posteriormente, adequar ao tipo penal correto. Quando a vítima realizar os registros de crime como lesão corporal, vias de fato ou outro que seja necessário realizar o exame de corpo de delito, o próprio sistema irá fornecer o BO juntamente com a requisição já pronta, assinada pela autoridade policial, para que se dirija ao Instituto Médico Legal (IML) para realizar o exame, não ter de esperar e a prova perecer”, enfatizou o titular da DI.

item.title: Wuhan begins to emerge from months-long isolation
item.description: Wuhan, the Chinese city where the novel Coronavirus was first detected, began emerging timidly on Saturday from its months-long isolation, with a passenger train stopping there just after midnight. The authorities had sealed off the city of 11 million people from the rest of the world in January to stem the spread of Covid-19.

item.title: Integrante de Morat dio positivo a coronavirus: “Nos parece responsable asumir que todos tenemos el virus”
item.description: Villamil, comentó en un video publicado en el Instagram de Morat, que no han padecido malestares muy graves: “Los síntomas han sido muy leves, y eso es tranquilizante porque no es algo que haya puesto en riesgo mi vida, pero también es importante entender que por los síntomas tan leves que se tiene, la probabilidad de contagio es muy alta y hay que tener mucho cuidado y seguir todas las recomendaciones”.

item.title: Queensland elections counts drag on, plagued by 'technical' issues
item.description: Queensland elections counts drag on, plagued by ‘technical’ issues Updated Queensland’s electoral commissioner says the technical issues experienced during the count for yesterday’s local government elections are “unacceptable”. Pat Vidgen said more than 1,000,000 votes were counted on Saturday, but problems with the “data feed” meant votes were not uploaded to the Electoral Commission of Queensland website in real-time.

В нашей стране случаи заражения COVID-19 фиксируются во все большем количестве областей. item.title: Kijárási korlátozás a koronavírus ellen - Hogy áll Magyarország a többiekhez képest?
item.description: Magyarországon ma életbe lépett a tegnap bejelentett kijárási korlátozás. Európa több országában is érvényben voltak már hasonló intézkedések, ezért hajlamosak lehetünk azt gondolni, hogy az intézkedést későn hoztuk meg. Ha viszont megnézzük az esetszámokat, amikor az intézkedést az országok bevezették, akkor kijelenthető, hogy Magyarország a leggyorsabbak között volt - főleg annak fényében igaz ez, hogy sok európai országban még ma sincs érvényben.

item.title: I was a VP at Alibaba during the SARS crisis in 2003. Here's what Jack Ma did to unite our team, accelerate revenue, and launch a new business amid the uncertainty of a pandemic.
item.description: Porter Erisman was working in China as vice president of the Alibaba Group in 2003 when the SARS pandemic struck, and he and 400 colleagues were quarantined at home. item.title: KMPDU Secretary General Ouma Oluga resigns
item.description: The Kenya Medical Practitioners Pharmacists and Dentists’ Union (KMPDU) Secretary General and CEO Dr Ouma Oluga has resigned. item.title: Confinement : des mesures drastiques prises à Sanary-sur-Mer
item.description: À Sanary-sur-Mer, dans le Var, le confinement contre le coronavirus Covid-19 est drastique. D’autant qu’en parallèle à la décision du gouvernement de prolonger pour au moins deux semaines le confinement sur l’ensemble du territoire, vendredi 27 mars, le maire de cette commune a annoncé une nouvelle série de mesures afin d'éviter que des personnes ne s’aventurent en dehors de leurs habitations, en renforçant les conditions de sortie.

item.title: Legal Claims against USA Cricket Dismissed by District Court in Colorado
item.description: USA Cricket has been successful in having legal claims brought against it by American Cricket Premier League (‘ACPL’) dismissed by the District Court in Colorado. item.title: In West African Coronavirus Hotspot, War Has Left 700,000 Homeless and Exposed
item.description: On March 18, Burkina Faso suffered the first confirmed Covid-19 fatality in all of sub-Saharan Africa. The victim was Rose-Marie Compaoré, the first vice president of the Sahelian nation’s parliament. Tiny, impoverished, and conflict-scarred, Burkina Faso is now West Africa’s worst-affected country, with 146 confirmed cases, including four government ministers.

item.title: Fish on
item.description: Seizing the opportunity to fish the freshly exposed lakes now void of ice can reap rewards only known to the savviest fishermen. While many often wait to fish for panfish until the bluegills and sunfish to make their beds, typically at the beginning of June, there is a miraculous time right after the ice has retreated and before the lily pads consume the perimeter of the lakes.

item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Markets experts warn investors to be cautious about trying to pick up bargains amid the current market turbulence. — TODAY pic SINGAPORE, March 10 — The Singapore stock market yesterday suffered its largest single-day drop since October 2008, as markets around the globe were battered following a plunge in oil prices that fuelled rising alarm over the economic impact of Covid-19.

item.title: How Does Dayang Enterprise Holdings Bhd’s (KLSE:DAYANG) P/E Compare To Its Industry, After The Share Price Drop?

Zooming out, the recent drop wiped out a year’s worth of gains, with the share price now back where it was a year ago.
